name: Buzzy
overview: Buzzy full release was released with level editor, this slick platformer (with documentation written entirely in French) has you in the role of Buzzy, who along with his family has been abducted by aliens in the middle of a dark and stormy night and has been turned into a bouncing ball for their amusement. You awake on a strange island and you must find your family by traveling through this curious place, collecting lollipops and eating mushrooms along the way. Along the way you will also find helpful trampolines to get the most out of your bounce.
